body: Aw, I was excited to see the sponsors get their comeuppance. Oh well, it was still a kinda fun spoof of the show. Everytime I read something with a plot like this, I always think about how unrealistic it is and how it would never happen in real life because...reasons, but then I remember Jeffery Epstein not killing himself, and Pizza Gate and that one green text story.
not nearly enough anchovy, but still pretty good

@Jopaste. A plausable reason is that miho never knew is that she was never a commander in the first plade. Meaning the possiblity a normal member of a team in any faction in senshadou knowing such information is only in a know how basis. Since the other factions only got thier commander/leader fucked

yeah they ded a car aint gonna survive against tigers and panthers

This makes no sense. If the team that loses gets raped then miho should already know about this. She lost the last event where katyusha won. Obviously these guys hunted down the girls so explain why miho got out of it the first time
